landingPage.resumeText: üïµÔ∏è Cybersecurity professional with Master's in Cyber Forensics and Security from Illinois Institute of Technology. üîí Experienced in penetration testing, vulnerability management, and network security with expertise in Kali Linux, Metasploit, and security frameworks like NIST-800 and ISO 27001. üí° Proven track record in teaching, technical support, and developing secure systems with strong analytical skills.

forensique.title: Cyber Forensics
forensique.contentText: Advanced skills in digital forensics using Autopsy, Wireshark, and other forensic tools. Expert in incident response, threat intelligence, and evidence analysis for cybersecurity investigations.

reverse.title: Penetration Testing
reverse.contentText: Expert in identifying vulnerabilities through structured penetration testing using Metasploit, Nmap, Burp Suite, and Kali Linux. Specialized in network security assessments and exploitation analysis.

devsecops.title: Security Assessment
devsecops.contentText: Comprehensive vulnerability management and security assessments. Expert in policy compliance, risk management, and implementing security frameworks like NIST-800, ISO 27001, and OWASP standards.

domotique.title: Network Security
domotique.contentText: Extensive experience with Cisco equipment, Mikrotik devices, and network troubleshooting. Skilled in configuring secure networks, VPN connections, and implementing Zero Trust architecture.

developpement.title: Security Training
developpement.contentText: Proven teaching experience as CCNA tutor and technical support specialist. Expert in delivering training on networking protocols, security concepts, and hands-on cybersecurity skills development.

aboutMePage.title: WHO AM I?
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I am a cybersecurity professional with a Master's degree in Cyber Forensics and Security from Illinois Institute of Technology, where I graduated with Summa Cum Laude honors.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: My expertise spans penetration testing, vulnerability management, and network security. I have hands-on experience with industry-leading tools including Kali Linux, Metasploit, Burp Suite, and Splunk. I'm well-versed in security frameworks such as NIST-800, ISO 27001, and OWASP, with a strong focus on implementing Zero Trust architectures and ensuring policy compliance.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: Beyond my technical skills, I have a passion for teaching and knowledge sharing. As a former CCNA tutor and teaching assistant, I've helped students understand complex networking concepts and practical cybersecurity skills. I believe in continuous learning and am currently pursuing CompTIA Security+ certification to further enhance my expertise in the field.
